Coffee Creamer French Toast


Ingredients
1/2 cup coffee creamer
1 1/2 teaspoons brown sugar
1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
1 splash vanilla extract
1 pinch salt
4 slices Italian bread
1 tablespoon butter
whipped cream (optional)
pinch ground cinnamon (optional)
prepared caramel sauce, to taste (optional)

Cooking Instructions

Whisk egg, coffee creamer, brown sugar, cinnamon, vanilla,
and salt together in a shallow dish until foamy and smooth;
set aside. Melt butter in a large nonstick skillet over
medium heat. Soak each slice of bread in egg mixture, 5 to 7
seconds per side. Place bread into the skillet, cook until
golden brown on both sides, 3 to 4 minutes per side. Serve
immediately. If desired, top with whipped cream, a dash of
cinnamon, and caramel sauce.
Source 

https://www.allrecipes.com/coffee-creamer-french-toast-recipe-8644003 

Reference Video 

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=Coffee Creamer French Toast
